get.description: This endpoint retrieves services available to your API client.

parameters.name: filter[package_type]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of package types to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[carrier]
parameters.description: Comma separated string of carrier ids to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[region_from]
parameters.description: <s>Comma separated string of region ids to filter by.</s>

parameters.name: filter[region_to]
parameters.description: <s>Comma separated string of region ids to filter by.</s>

parameters.name: filter[address_from][country_code]
parameters.description: Country code of origin location to filter by. Combine with `filter[address_from][postal_code]` for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_from][state_code]
parameters.description: State code of origin location to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[address_from][postal_code]
parameters.description: Postal code of origin location to filter by. Combine with `filter[address_from][country_code]` for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][country_code]
parameters.description: Country code of destination location to filter by. Combine with `filter[address_to][postal_code]` for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][state_code]
parameters.description: State code of destination location to filter by.

parameters.name: filter[address_to][postal_code]
parameters.description: Postal code of destination location to filter by. Combine with `filter[address_to][country_code]` for more accurate results.

parameters.name: filter[has_active_contract]
parameters.description:
Boolean value.
  • `true` Only services with active contract associations.
  • `false` Only services without active contract associations.

parameters.name: filter[delivery_method]
parameters.description:
Filter the services retrieved based on given delivery method. Possible options are:
  • `delivery`
  • `pick-up`

parameters.name: filter[code]
parameters.description: Filter the services retrieved based on given code.

parameters.name: filter[strict_consolidation]
parameters.description:
Boolean value.
  • `true` Services that only handle consolidated shipments.
  • `false` Only services without strict consolidation.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Comma separated string of the relationship names you want to include the data of.
The relationships that can be included are:
  • `carrier`
  • `service_options`
